controller

Class PopUpAlerts

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.PopUpAlerts

  • public class PopUpAlerts
extends java.lang.Object
    The PopUpAlerts class is a class with static methods related to showing a popup window to the user. All methods are static so that they can be accessed anywhere without the need to create an instance of the PopUpAlert class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PopUpAlerts() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void edgeAlert()
      Creates a warning when trying to expand the board by drawing and exceeding the maximum height or width.
      static void editorSizeAlert() 
      static void gifFPSAlert()
      Creates a warning when trying to set the fps of a gif above 50, telling the user to select a valid value.
      static void gifFramesAlert()
      Creates a warning when trying to set the number of iterations of a gif to either 0 or above 400, telling the user to select a valid value.
      static boolean gifSimilarityAlert(int iterations)
      Creates a popup when trying to save a gif, and the statistics have identified a high probability of a repeating pattern.
      static void ioAlertFromDisk()
      Creates a warning when failing to load a file from disk.
      static void ioAlertFromURL()
      Creates a warning when failing to load a file from an URL.
      static void ioAlertFXML()
      Creates a warning if an FXML file could not be loaded.
      static void ioeSaveError()
      Creates a warning when a file cannot be saved to disk.
      static void metaData(java.lang.String header, java.lang.String description)
      Creates a popup window containing the meta data of the currently loaded pattern.
      static void outOfBounds()
      Creates a warning when trying to load a pattern that exceeds the maximum bounds of the cell grid.
      static void patternFormatAlert()
      Creates a warning when a loaded file is wrongly formatted.
      static void resizeAlert()
      Creates a warning when trying to set the size of the board to an invalid number, advising the user to set a size between 6 and 1000.
      static boolean resizeClearAlert()
      Creates a warning when trying to resize the board in the editor, warning the user that the currently active cells will become inactive if the board is resized.
      static void ruleAlert1()
      Creates a warning when a loaded file's rules are wrongly formatted, informing the user that the standard rules will be used.
      static void ruleAlert2()
      Creates a warning when the user attempts to set wrongly formatted rules.
      static void ruleDescription(java.lang.String ruleName, java.lang.String ruleString, java.lang.String ruleDescription)
      Creates a popup window containing the description of the current playing rules.
      static void sizeBoardError()
      Creates a warning when trying to export a gif where the board is too big relative to the size of the gif-picture so that the cell size is less than a pixel, and therefore will not be drawn.

        Creates a warning when a loaded file is wrongly formatted.

      • ruleAlert1

        public static void ruleAlert1()
        Creates a warning when a loaded file's rules are wrongly formatted, informing the user that the standard rules will be used.

      • ruleAlert2

        public static void ruleAlert2()
        Creates a warning when the user attempts to set wrongly formatted rules. Gives formatting tips.

      • outOfBounds

        public static void outOfBounds()
        Creates a warning when trying to load a pattern that exceeds the maximum bounds of the cell grid.

      • ioeSaveError

        public static void ioeSaveError()
        Creates a warning when a file cannot be saved to disk.

      • sizeBoardError

        public static void sizeBoardError()
        Creates a warning when trying to export a gif where the board is too big relative to the size of the gif-picture so that the cell size is less than a pixel, and therefore will not be drawn.

      • gifFramesAlert

        public static void gifFramesAlert()
        Creates a warning when trying to set the number of iterations of a gif to either 0 or above 400, telling the user to select a valid value.

      • gifFPSAlert

        public static void gifFPSAlert()
        Creates a warning when trying to set the fps of a gif above 50, telling the user to select a valid value.

      • resizeAlert

        public static void resizeAlert()
        Creates a warning when trying to set the size of the board to an invalid number, advising the user to set a size between 6 and 1000.

      • editorSizeAlert

        public static void editorSizeAlert()

      • edgeAlert

        public static void edgeAlert()
        Creates a warning when trying to expand the board by drawing and exceeding the maximum height or width. Advises the user to either continue playing within the borders, or resetting the board.

      • ruleDescription

        public static void ruleDescription(java.lang.String ruleName,
                                   java.lang.String ruleString,
                                   java.lang.String ruleDescription)
        Creates a popup window containing the description of the current playing rules.
        Parameters:
        ruleName - The name of the rules.
        ruleString - The RLE-formatting of the current rules.
        ruleDescription - The description of the current rules.

      • metaData

        public static void metaData(java.lang.String header,
                            java.lang.String description)
        Creates a popup window containing the meta data of the currently loaded pattern.
        Parameters:
        header - The name of the pattern.
        description - The metadata of the pattern.

      • gifSimilarityAlert

        public static boolean gifSimilarityAlert(int iterations)
        Creates a popup when trying to save a gif, and the statistics have identified a high probability of a repeating pattern. It informs the user that the pattern is likely to repeat after n-number of iterations, and asks if it should set the number of images to that number. Returns true if yes or false if no.
        Parameters:
        iterations - The number of iterations identified as a possible pattern repeat.
        Returns:
        b - The users answer.

      • resizeClearAlert

        public static boolean resizeClearAlert()
        Creates a warning when trying to resize the board in the editor, warning the user that the currently active cells will become inactive if the board is resized. User can then choose whether or not to continue with the resizing.
        Returns:
        b - The users answer.
